UnixGuru Hosting
Provider of Super Fast, Super Stable, Super Secure, Super Scalable shared hosting.
DDoS Protected Shared & Reseller LiteSpeed Hosting on Cloud Linux Servers
BitNinja Security & Comodo Web Application Firewall (for LiteSpeed)


All accounts come with:-

  • Cisco/Tilera/Arbor DDoS Protection

  • CloudLinux - Stability, Security & Performance
  • LiteSpeed Web Server (with LiteMage the world's fastest Magento Cache, 20x Faster than NGINX & Turpentine(Varnish)

  • Softaculous Script Installer
  • Patchman (automated Vulnerability patching)
  • UG SiteBuilder
  • Tendy Tools HTML Site Builder
  • R1Soft CDP (Continuous Data Protection) backups


LiteSpeed Hosting

  • Between 400% and 4000% faster than Apache, depending on the workload type.
  • LiteSpeed Cache, switch on/off in your .htaccess file to create blisteringly fast websites
  • LiteMage Cache, the world's fastest Magento Caching system, 20 x Faster than NGINX with Turpentine(Varnish)
  • Extra built-in security & anti-DDoS features

Reseller Hosting

All reseller account come with a dedicated IP address

SEO & Ultimate Reseller accounts also include:

  • 1 x IP in each of the above 13 european zones, available in a single reseller account.
  • 24 x Extra UK IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 10 x Extra German IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 7 x Extra Finnish IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 3 x Extra French IPs in separate Class C (/24) networks
  • 1 x Extra Polish IPs in a separate Class C (/24) network

More than 50 IPs to choose from!

This allows you to resell hosting in any of these regions and provide a "local" IP Address.
Our fast European network means that any IP responds quickly across Europe as all

System Software

Modern CLLMPP Stack (CloudLinux/LiteSpeed/MariaDB & PHP/Perl)
  • CloudLinux 6.8
  • LiteSpeed 5.14 (Apache compatible drop in replacement)
  • PHP 5.6.23 (Default)
  • MariaDB 10.1.13
  • Exim 4.87 with UG SpamBuster v3.07

Selectable Hardened PHP Versions (per user)
  • PHP 7.1.0 - with Customisable modules (Bleeding Edge, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 7.0.8 - with Customisable modules (Cutting Edge, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.6.23 - with Customisable modules (Current, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.5.37 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.4.45 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.3.29 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.2.17 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 5.1.6 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
  • PHP 4.4.9 - with Customisable modules (Legacy - Hardened by CloudLinux, secured by CageFS)
(Infact all PHP Versions are secured by CageFS, Virtual Filesystem Technology, each user has their own copy of the binaries, so cannot harm other users).

R1Soft Continuous Data Protection

  • Snapshots taken every 30 minutes
  • Hourly archives retained for 24 hours
  • Archives taken every 3 hours retained for 7 daily
  • Daily archives retained for 31 days
  • Weekly archives retained for 3 months
